Description: The map-cache is kept alive and no packet encapsulation occurs.
The packet is not encapsulated or dropped but natively forwarded.
The packet invokes sending a Map-Request.
A packet that matches this map-cache entry is dropped. An ICMP Unreachable message SHOULD be sent.

A packet matching this Map-Cache entry is dropped because the target EID is
        policy-denied by the xTR or the Mapping System.

A packet matching this Map-Cache entry is dropped because the Map-Request
        for the target EID fails an authentication check by the xTR or the Mapping System.
